attributes.action: The government must hold a general election at the end of the year 2023
attributes.additional_details:
It is unfair for the current government to hold power- they no longer uphold any of the election promises from Boris Johnson’s government, the one we chose.
The Conservative Party chose the current government, and the people have had no say in the policies or people who now run the country.
attributes.background: The government should hold a general election at the end of 2023- the government in power is no longer the one we chose in 2019

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Call a General Election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631901

Confirm that the next General Election will be no later than 28 January 2025: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637463
